parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the turbocharger can cause the engine to stall or shut down without warning, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The engine dies or stalls while driving
the vehicle loses power and cannot be restarted
the Electronic Power Control warning light appears
the steering and brakes may be affected.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Mechatronic Unit Failure in 7-Speed DSG Transmission
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the mechatronic unit can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to sudden loss of power, jerking, and stalling, which can increase the risk of accidents and leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: transmission malfunction code on the dashboard

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Turbocharger failure can cause engine stalling, loss of power, and reduced acceleration, which can increase the risk of accidents and lead to costly repairs.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sudden Loss of Power and Transmission Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of power and transmission malfunction can cause the vehicle to stall or become stuck in gear, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents, especially in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly stops or loses power
warning lights and messages appear on the dashboard
and the vehicle may not be able to shift into reverse gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failure and engine revving can cause the vehicle to lose power and control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: the vehicle may not be able to shift into gear
and warning lights and messages appear on the dashboard.
